testcase.name: Login the Application
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Master Module..............................................passed Then Click on the State screen..............................................passed And To verify whether Search is holding the placeholder or not..............passed And To verify whether Search is displaying the records or not when the user enters Invalid data.passed And To verify whether it is displaying the records or not by entering with the State name Search criteria.passed When To verify whether the State Code Country IGST SGST CGST Active and Action columns are to be displayed or not.passed And To verify whether the user able to view the add button or not...........passed And To verify whether the add button is clickable or not....................passed Then To verify when the user click on the add button the create State form is displaying or not.passed And To verify whether the State name State code Country code IGST SGST CGST active checkbox cancel and Save buttons.passed Then To verify whether the user able to view the State name field or not....passed And To verify whether the entered data is properly displayed or not.........passed And To verify whether the user able to view the State Code field or not.....passed And To verify whether the user able to enter the data in state code text field or not.passed Then To verify whether the user able to view the Country name field or not..passed And To verify whether the Country names are retrieved from the Country name screen or not.passed Then To verify whether the user able to view the IGST field or not..........passed And To verify whether the IGST field is enable state or not.................passed And To verify whether the IGST field is text box field or not...............passed And To verify whether the entered data is properly displayed in IGST or not.passed Then To verify whether the user able to view the SGST field or not..........passed And To verify whether the SGST field is enable state or not.................passed And To verify whether the SGST field is text box field or not...............passed And To verify whether the entered data is properly displayed in SGST or not.passed Then To verify whether the user able to view the CGST field or not..........passed And To verify whether the CGST field is enable state or not.................passed And To verify whether the CGST field is text box field or not...............passed And To verify whether the CGST field is mandatory field or not..............passed And To verify whether the entered data is properly displayed in CGST or not.passed Then To verify whether the user able to view the save button or not.........passed And To verify whether the save button is enable state or not................passed And To verify when the user click on the save button the State saved successfully msg is displaying or not.passed And Verify that user able to view the Save Record in grid...................passed
